title: E-Learning Mathematics Teaching Method Design Utilizing Constructivist-Based Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary Mathematical Concepts and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments for preservice or in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can establish self-directed learning plans using flipped learning materials designed according to constructivist principles.
Learners can improve mathematical problem-solving skills by 20% through online discussions and collaborative activities.
Learners can submit math lesson designs applicable to real educational settings through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
